body:
> One question: AIUI this would allow one recipe to clear storage that affects another recipe. 

It shouldn't. The only place storage is exposed to the sandbox is via the driver's `createStorage` function, which calls `Storage.makeStorage`. The `Storage` object itself is never made available to the sandbox, so recipes can't call it. I could be missing something, though.
